TopChartTVShows.title: DAREDEVIL
TopChartTVShows.description: Matt Murdock manages to overcome the challenges that he faces due to him being blind since childhood and fights criminals as a lawyer and Daredevil.

TopChartTVShows.title: PUNISHER
TopChartTVShows.description: Frank Castle uncovers a conspiracy that runs deeper than New York's criminal underworld. Now known as the Punisher.

TopChartTVShows.title: FLASH
TopChartTVShows.description: Barry Allen, a forensic investigator in Central City, gains the power of superhuman speed from a freak accident. He decides to use it to fight crime as the Flash, a costumed superhero.

TopChartTVShows.title: ARROW
TopChartTVShows.description: Spoiled billionaire playboy Oliver Queen is missing and presumed dead when his yacht is lost at sea. He returns five years later a changed man, determined to clean up the city as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow.

TopChartTVShows.title: LOKI
TopChartTVShows.description: After stealing the Tesseract, Loki comes into contact with a mysterious organization that gives him an ominous ultimatum, either fix the timeline or cease to exist completely.

TopChartMovies.title: ZSJL
TopChartMovies.description: Bruce Wayne and Diana Prince try to bring the metahumans of Earth together after the death of Clark Kent. Meanwhile, Darkseid sends Steppenwolf to Earth with a vast army to subjugate humans.

TopChartMovies.title: AVENGERS INFINITY WAR
TopChartMovies.description: As Thanos quest for finding the infinity stones, The Avengers join forces to stop him.

TopChartMovies.title: DARK KNIGHT
TopChartMovies.description: Batman has a new foe, the Joker, who is an accomplished criminal hell-bent on decimating Gotham City. Batman struggles to thwart the Joker.

TopChartMovies.title: AVENGERS ENDGAME
TopChartMovies.description: After Thanos eliminates half of the universe, the Avengers must assemble again to bring their trounced allies & restore balance.

TopChartMovies.title: MAN OF STEEL
TopChartMovies.description: Clark learns about the source of his abilities & his real home when he enters a Kryptonian ship in the Artic. However, an old enemy follows him to Earth in search of a codex and brings destruction.

NewestReleases.title: SUPERMAN & LOIS
NewestReleases.description: Married with two sons, Jonathan & Jordan, Clark Kent & Lois Lane head back to Smallville to reunite with their closest friends.

NewestReleases.title: JOKER: FOLIE à DEUX
NewestReleases.description: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life at Arkham State Hospital.

NewestReleases.title: VENOM THE LAST DANCE
NewestReleases.description: Eddie Brock & Venom must make a decision as they're pursued by a military man & alien monsters from Venom's home world.

NewestReleases.title: PENGUIN
NewestReleases.description: The transformation of Oz Cobb from a disfigured nobody to a noted Gotham gangster.

NewestReleases.title: DEADPOOL & WOLVERINE
NewestReleases.description: Deadpool unites with Wolverine to complete the mission & save his world from an existential Multiverse threat.

UpcomingReleases.title: KRAVEN THE HUNTER
UpcomingReleases.description: Kraven's vengeance, motivating him to become the greatest hunter in the world.

UpcomingReleases.title: CAPTAIN AMERICA⁴
UpcomingReleases.description: Sam finds himself in the middle of an international incident after meeting with President Thaddeus Ross.

UpcomingReleases.title: THUNDERBOLTS
UpcomingReleases.description: A group of supervillains are recruited to go on missions for the government.

UpcomingReleases.title: DAREDEVIL BORN AGAIN
UpcomingReleases.description: Matt Murdock & Wilson Fisk past identities begin to emerge, both men find themselves on an inevitable collision course.

UpcomingReleases.title: THE BATMAN²
UpcomingReleases.description: A sequel to the The Batman(2022).

DCImprintMovies.title: WATCHMEN
DCImprintMovies.description: Rorschach, a vigilante, investigates the death of another vigilante and warns his former companions that this might be a plan to kill people like them. However, he is exposed to a much darker plot.

DCImprintMovies.title: HISTORY OF VIOLENCE
DCImprintMovies.description: Tom, a man with a wife & 2 sons kills 2 robbers in self-defence. Later, a man comes into their lives claiming Tom is not the man he is.

DCImprintMovies.title: V FOR VENDETTA
DCImprintMovies.description: A freedom fighter 'V' uses terrorist tactics to fight the oppressive society.

DCImprintMovies.title: CONSTANTINE
DCImprintMovies.description: Detective Angela approaches Constantine, a demon hunter, to help her investigate her twin sister's mysterious death. As he digs deeper, he realizes that demons are trying to enter the human world.

DCImprintMovies.title: JONAH HEX
DCImprintMovies.description: After his family is murdered by the terrorist Turnbull, a nearly dead Jonah is revived mystically and gains supernatural abilities. Later, the president seeks his help to stop an attack by Turnball.

MarvelImprintMovies.title: MEN IN BLACK
MarvelImprintMovies.description: Agent J of the MIB investigates a strange murder and uncovers a dangerous alien plot to destroy Earth.

MarvelImprintMovies.title: KINGSMAN
MarvelImprintMovies.description: A young man is recruited by a secret spy agency and is sent on his first mission, which involves foiling a global plot.

MarvelImprintMovies.title: KICK-ASS
MarvelImprintMovies.description: A regular teen decides to become a superhero. However, his life is complicated when he crosses paths with an eccentric father-daughter duo of vigilantes.

MarvelImprintMovies.title: MAN-THING
MarvelImprintMovies.description: A Florida sheriff investigates strange occurrences near a swamp. A terrifying supernatural creature is revealed in the process.

MarvelImprintMovies.title: MEN IN BLACK 3
MarvelImprintMovies.description: Agent J travels back in time to stop a villain from altering history and destroying the future.

DCAnimation.title: FLASHPOINT PARADOX
DCAnimation.description: The Flash alters the timeline while trying to prevent his mother's death, resulting in a dystopian world and a different Justice League.

DCAnimation.title: JL WAR
DCAnimation.description: The Justice League must join forces to face the combined forces of Darkseid and his minions who have come to destroy Earth.

DCAnimation.title: TEEN TITANS: THE JUDAS CONTRACT
DCAnimation.description: The Teen Titans must stop an evil conspiracy involving Terra, who has been manipulated by Deathstroke.

DCAnimation.title: SUICIDE SQUAD: HELL TO PAY
DCAnimation.description: The Suicide Squad is tasked with retrieving a mystical artifact, and the consequences of failure are dire.

DCAnimation.title: SUPERMAN UNBOUND
DCAnimation.description: Superman must confront the villain Brainiac, who threatens to destroy Earth and the entire city of Metropolis.

MarvelAnimation.title: PLANET HULK
MarvelAnimation.description: The Hulk is exiled to a distant planet where he becomes a gladiator and has to fight for survival.

MarvelAnimation.title: INTO THE SPIDERVERSE
MarvelAnimation.description: Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man and teams up with other versions of Spider-Man to stop a multiversal villain.

MarvelAnimation.title: ULTIMATE AVENGERS
MarvelAnimation.description: The Ultimate Avengers team assembles to stop the invading alien force threatening Earth.

MarvelAnimation.title: ACROSS THE SPIDERVERSE
MarvelAnimation.description: Miles Morales continues his journey across the multiverse, encountering different versions of Spider-Man.

MarvelAnimation.title: BIG HERO 6
MarvelAnimation.description: A young robotics prodigy forms a team to fight a masked villain and protect the city of San Fransokyo.
